meanings.definition: The act or process of decoding or interpreting something, especially written or spoken language.
meanings.sent1: Her decipherments of ancient hieroglyphics amazed the scholars.
meanings.sent2: The decipherments of the secret code revealed a hidden message.
meanings.sent3: The detective's decipherments of the cryptic note led to solving the case.
meanings.sent4: His decipherments of the mysterious symbols unlocked a long-lost treasure.
meanings.sent5: The student's decipherments of the complex text were meticulous and accurate.

meanings.definition: The result or outcome of successfully decoding or interpreting something.
meanings.sent1: The decipherments of the ancient manuscript provided valuable insights.
meanings.sent2: The decipherments of the encrypted message were shared with the team.
meanings.sent3: The archaeologist's decipherments of the ancient script were celebrated with a feast.
meanings.sent4: The decipherments of the riddle brought joy to the puzzled children.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's decipherments of the data revealed a groundbreaking discovery.
